body:
I've decided after quitting back in June it's time to return! Many of you may already know me from the past but if you don't know me then i'm looking forward to meeting you and all of the new community! If you have any questions for me please free to ask below and i will answer as soon as possible.

Also any of the old community who are still here even if you just lurk the forums , like i did for awhile , feel free to say hey.It would be awesome! to see you guys again.
